_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

RequestForQuotation.description: A document used to request a Quotation for goods and services from a Seller.

RequestForQuotation.title: Request For Quotation. Details
RequestForQuotation.description: A document used to request a Quotation for goods and services from a Seller.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Request For Quotation. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Request For Quotation. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Request For Quotation. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Request For Quotation. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Request For Quotation. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Request For Quotation. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Request For Quotation. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Request For Quotation. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Request For Quotation. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

SubmissionDueDate.title: Request For Quotation. Submission Due Date. Date
SubmissionDueDate.description: The due date for submission of the Quotation.

Note.title: Request For Quotation. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Request For Quotation. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: The currency that the Seller should use to price the Quotation.

LineCountNumeric.title: Request For Quotation. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Request For Quotation Lines in this document.

RequestedValidityPeriod.title: Request For Quotation. Requested Validity_ Period. Period
RequestedValidityPeriod.description: The validity period requested for this Quotation.

CatalogueDocumentReference.title: Request For Quotation. Catalogue_ Document Reference. Document Reference
CatalogueDocumentReference.description: The Catalogue on which this Request for Quotation is based.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Request For Quotation. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Request For Quotation. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Request For Quotation. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Request For Quotation. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Request For Quotation. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

Delivery.title: Request For Quotation. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.

DeliveryTerms.title: Request For Quotation. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.

DestinationCountry.title: Request For Quotation. Destination_ Country. Country
DestinationCountry.description: The country of destination of potential orders (for customs purposes).

Contract.title: Request For Quotation. Contract
Contract.description: A contract associated with this Request for Quotation..

RequestForQuotationLine.title: Request For Quotation. Request For Quotation Line
RequestForQuotationLine.description: A line specifying a kind of item of sale.
